title: i already have riot kayle but i don't know if i got the myster skin from riot ,
body:
hi sums i have riot kayle but i don't know if i get the free skin
can some one that have riot kayle tell me if he got the skin pls
sry for the english

replies.body: I am still waiting too... I only got the icon like 5 days ago, but no skin yet. And I had Riot Kayle before so... I am waiting and hoping not to stay like this
Is anyone else still waiting on his gift? Just checking.
what if i got riot kayle already what would i recive besides the icon??
I have Riot Kayle but i did not recive  anything, no icon, no mystery skin........ I hope u did not forget me xD

Your account hasn't received a gift just yet!  Gifts are still rolling out, and we are posting updates on our[ support ticker.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-)  It's going to take a bit to grant gifts to every eligible item, so hang tight!

Do Players receive the icon and the skin at the same time?
I just checked, I received the Kayle skin, but not the icon. (Not yet I suppose :P)
Nope!  You may not get everything at once, and will need to hold out until it's all finished!
